duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain a book of residual income by actively seeking new business opportunities.
Prioritize and manage multiple touch points to drive business outcomes and ensure follow-through.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and portfolio building to solve business owners' problems in promoting and selling products or services.
Maintain client relationships, renew contracts, and drive future revenue growth.
Effectively communicate and bring concepts to life to influence and persuade prospective clients.
Utilize a custom CRM platform for client acquisition and management.
Participate in critical business discussions to address client needs and challenges.
Undergo training on publishing-related aspects to enhance sales performance.
Work with high standards and dedication to achieve high earning potential.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
